oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An outbreak of contagious bovine pleuropneumonia in Ngamiland district of north-western Botswana
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Amanfu, W.
Masupu, K. V.
Adom, E. K.
Raborokgwe, M. V.
Bashiruddin, J. B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: contagious bovine pleuropneumonia
Botswana
lung
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An outbreak of contagious bovine pleuropneumonia (CBPP) was detected in Botswana in 1995 after more than half a century of freedom from the disease. Full article published in Veterinary Record (1998) 143, 46-48.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1998; 130
